Text:
Short description here because i was getting fed up losing all my typing by getting the upload code wrong!!!

This is Sci-Fi.

As Britain struggles with the collapse of civilisation,a monstrous power in space threatens the youth of the world.Wherever crowds gather,a blinding light reaches down to disintegrate everything.Quatermass tries to halt this sinister force and faces a devastating climax.......
Hi Wolf, I'd really appreciate a reseed of this if possible. I know its been going on 3 years since you first put it on but,....................what can I say. Missed it :(

Hi wolf359

Would it be possible for you to re-seed this and disc 2 please? I've actually registered for the chance to request this stunning piece of tv history. With a name like 'wolf359' I should say 'resistance is futile' (but I won't!) Cheers, in anticipation. I will seed it myself for 6 months to give this torrent life again.
Please seed!!! I downloaded this torrent over 6 months ago and am still waiting for it to start d/l - I really loved this show.PLeeease!!!

just to forestall anyone else requesting seeds - the chance of wolf359 looking back at this old torrent for new comments is nearly zero. this is why I wish TPB  allowed PMs or could notify unloaders of comments like many other sites do

http://www.archive.org/details/PhotosbyHaroldQuatermassIIAllSixPartsCompiledintoOneFile

The whole series is available here :)
